_comment: Svoi Telegram Mini App configuration — reference for @BotFather setup
mini_app_description: Свой базар — доска объявлений для русских в Белграде
_setup_instructions: 2. Send /newbot and follow setup → save the token to TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN
3. Send /mybots → select your bot → Bot Settings → Menu Button
5. Set button text to: Открыть Svoi
6. Send /newapp to create the Mini App entry
7. Set the Mini App URL to: https://svoi.app
